Library-Management-System documentation
=======================================

Add your content using ``reStructuredText`` syntax. See the
`reStructuredText <https://www.sphinx-doc.org/en/master/usage/restructuredtext/index.html>`_
documentation for details.

这是我的 ``Java练习项目`` ，GitHub仓库地址为 `Introduction-To-Programming-In-Java <https://github.com/sweeter-byte/Introduction-To-Programming-In-Java>`_,Java基础语法部分来自于 `MIT 6.092 Course <https://ocw.mit.edu/courses/6-092-introduction-to-programming-in-java-january-iap-2010/>`_,第一个项目是写一个图书管理系统，预计耗时5天。
